verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, put forth <S%H2330><s%> a riddle <S%H2420><s%>, and speak <S%H4911><s%> a parable <S%H4912><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

And say <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; A great <S%H1419><s%> eagle <S%H5404><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%>, longwinged <S%H83><s%>, full <S%H4392><s%> of feathers <S%H5133><s%>, which had various colors <S%H7553><s%>, came <S%H935><s%> unto Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> the highest branch <S%H6788><s%> of the cedar <S%H730><s%>:

He cropped off <S%H6998><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of his young twigs <S%H3242><s%>, and carried <S%H935><s%> it into a land <S%H776><s%> of traffic <S%H3667><s%>; he set <S%H7760><s%> it in a city <S%H5892><s%> of merchants <S%H7402><s%>.

He took <S%H3947><s%> also of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, and planted <S%H5414><s%> it in a fruitful <S%H2233><s%> field <S%H7704><s%>; he placed <S%H3947><s%> it by great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> it as a willow tree <S%H6851><s%>.

And it grew <S%H6779><s%>, and became a spreading <S%H5628><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%> of low <S%H8217><s%> stature <S%H6967><s%>, whose branches <S%H1808><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> toward him <S%H8328><s%>, and the roots there were under him <S%H1612><s%>: so it became a vine, and brought forth <S%H6213><s%> branches <S%H905><s%>, and shot <S%H7971><s%> forth sprigs <S%H6288><s%>.

There was also another <S%H259><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> eagle <S%H5404><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> feathers <S%H5133><s%>: and <S%H1612><s%>, behold, this vine did bend <S%H3719><s%> her roots <S%H8328><s%> toward him <S%H7971><s%>, and shot forth her branches <S%H1808><s%> toward him <S%H8248><s%>, that he might water it by the furrows <S%H6170><s%> of her plantation <S%H4302><s%>.

It was planted <S%H8362><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> soil <S%H7704><s%> by great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, that it might bring forth <S%H6213><s%> branches <S%H6057><s%>, and that it might bear <S%H5375><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%>, that it might be a good <S%H155><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> you <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Shall it prosper <S%H6743><s%>? shall he not pull up <S%H5423><s%> the roots <S%H8328><s%> there <S%H7082><s%>, and cut off the fruit <S%H6529><s%> there <S%H3001><s%>, that it wither? it shall wither <S%H3001><s%> in all the leaves <S%H2964><s%> of her spring <S%H6780><s%>, even without great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H2220><s%> or many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to pluck it up <S%H5375><s%> by the roots there <S%H8328><s%>.

Yes <S%H8362><s%>, behold, being planted, shall it prosper <S%H6743><s%>? shall it not utterly <S%H3001><s%> wither <S%H3001><s%>, when the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> it <S%H3001><s%>? it shall wither in the furrows <S%H6170><s%> where it grew <S%H6780><s%>.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Say <S%H559><s%> now to the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, Know <S%H3045><s%> you not what these things mean <S%H559><s%>? tell them <S%H4428><s%>, Behold, the king of Babylon <S%H894><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and has taken <S%H3947><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> there <S%H8269><s%>, and the princes there <S%H935><s%>, and led them with him to Babylon <S%H894><s%>;

And has taken <S%H3947><s%> of the king <S%H4410><s%>'s seed <S%H2233><s%>, and made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him <S%H935><s%>, and has taken a oath <S%H423><s%> of him <S%H3947><s%>: he has also taken the mighty <S%H352><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>:

That the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> might be base <S%H8217><s%>, that it might not lift itself up <S%H5375><s%>, but that by keeping <S%H8104><s%> of his covenant <S%H1285><s%> it might stand <S%H5975><s%>.

But he rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against him in sending <S%H7971><s%> his ambassadors <S%H4397><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that they might give <S%H5414><s%> him horses <S%H5483><s%> and much <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>. Shall he prosper <S%H6743><s%>? shall he escape <S%H4422><s%> that does <S%H6213><s%> such things <S%H6565><s%>? or shall he break the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and be delivered <S%H4422><s%>?

As I live <S%H2416><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, surely in the place <S%H4725><s%> where the king <S%H4428><s%> dwells that made him king <S%H4427><s%>, whose oath <S%H423><s%> he despised <S%H959><s%>, and whose covenant <S%H1285><s%> he broke <S%H6565><s%>, even with him in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> he shall die <S%H4191><s%>.

Neither shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> with his mighty <S%H1419><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> and great <S%H7227><s%> company <S%H6951><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> for him in the war <S%H4421><s%>, by casting up <S%H8210><s%> mounts <S%H5550><s%>, and building <S%H1129><s%> forts <S%H1785><s%>, to cut off <S%H3772><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> persons <S%H5315><s%>:

Seeing he despised <S%H959><s%> the oath <S%H423><s%> by breaking <S%H6565><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, when <S%H5414><s%>, behold, he had given his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and has done <S%H6213><s%> all these things <S%H4422><s%>, he shall not escape.

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; As I live <S%H2416><s%>, surely my oath <S%H423><s%> that he has despised <S%H959><s%>, and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> that he has broken <S%H6331><s%>, even it will I recompense <S%H5414><s%> upon his own head <S%H7218><s%>.

And I will spread <S%H6566><s%> my net <S%H7568><s%> upon him <S%H8610><s%>, and he shall be taken in my snare <S%H4686><s%>, and I will bring <S%H935><s%> him to Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and will plead <S%H8199><s%> with him there for his trespass <S%H4603><s%> that he has trespassed against me <S%H4604><s%>.

And all his fugitives <S%H4015><s%> with all his bands <S%H102><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and they that remain <S%H7604><s%> shall be scattered <S%H6566><s%> toward all winds <S%H7307><s%>: and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; I will also take <S%H3947><s%> of the highest branch <S%H6788><s%> of the high <S%H7311><s%> cedar <S%H730><s%>, and will set <S%H5414><s%> it <S%H6998><s%>; I will crop off from the top <S%H7218><s%> of his young twigs <S%H3127><s%> a tender one <S%H7390><s%>, and will plant <S%H8362><s%> it upon a high <S%H1364><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> and eminent <S%H8524><s%>:

In the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the height <S%H4791><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will I plant <S%H8362><s%> it <S%H5375><s%>: and it shall bring forth boughs <S%H6057><s%>, and bear <S%H6213><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%>, and be a good <S%H117><s%> cedar <S%H730><s%>: and under it shall live <S%H7931><s%> all bird <S%H6833><s%> of every wing <S%H3671><s%>; in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the branches <S%H1808><s%> there shall they live <S%H7931><s%>.

And all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have brought down <S%H8213><s%> the high <S%H1364><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, have exalted <S%H1361><s%> the low <S%H8217><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, have dried <S%H3001><s%> up the green <S%H3892><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, and have made the dry <S%H3002><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> to flourish <S%H6524><s%>: I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> and have done it <S%H6213><s%>.
